## DateTimeSelector.setMaxValue() method

Sets maximal possible value for picker, that can be picked

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMaxValue(value: TDate | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TDate \| null | Maximal possible value that can be picked |
